en.pageDesc: Learn how to use Mockoon's features and mock your REST server or API like a pro!
en.pageSubtitle: Learn how to use Mockoon's features and mock your REST server or API like a pro!
en.tutorialProxyModeDesc: Learn how to partially mock a REST API and proxy to another server with Mockoon.
en.tutorialHttpsModeTitle: Serve a mock API over TLS
en.tutorialHttpsModeDesc: Need to mock a secured API? Mockoon can also do this!
en.tutorialCorsTitle: Automatic handling of preflight OPTIONS requests
en.tutorialCorsDesc: Front and API are not on the same domain? Handle preflight requests automatically with Mockoon.
en.tutorialPrefixDesc: Want to prefix your mock server routes? Learn how to do it with Mockoon
en.tutorialRequestsLogsDesc: Check how to access Mockoon's entering requests logs for easier debugging
